rules.natural: Provided that company alpha develops medication, medication X is recalled from the market.

Either company alpha develops medication, or if it is not the case that the absence of investment in venture capital implies the herbal tincture contains alcohol, then the herbal tincture passes the safety test.
Either company beta develops medication or company alpha does not develop medication.
Under the condition that company gamma develops medication, company gamma acquires a license.
Either company gamma develops medication or company delta develops medication.
If company delta develops medication, then company beta does not develop medication.
Whenever company gamma acquires a license, company beta does not develop medication.
If company epsilon develops medication, then whenever the disinfectant passes the clinical trial, the disinfectant is approved by the FDA.
Provided that lab 1 uses organic extract, either lab 1 uses synthetic base or venture capital has investment.
If medication X is approved for sale, then it is not recalled from the market.
Under the condition that company eta develops medication, company eta acquires a license.
Provided that company eta develops medication, company eta does not acquire a license.
Either company eta develops medication, or company zeta develops medication, or if company alpha develops medication, medication X is approved for sale.
Whenever company beta faces a lawsuit, either company gamma violates a patent or company beta does not violate a patent.
If company gamma faces a lawsuit, then company beta faces a lawsuit.
Either lab 1 uses chemical catalyst or lab 1 uses organic extract.
Either company beta hires a law firm or company gamma hires a law firm.
Under the condition that company gamma hires a law firm, if company gamma does not face a lawsuit, then company gamma settles out of court.
Either company beta negotiates a settlement or if company beta hires a law firm, then provided company gamma does not face a lawsuit, company gamma settles out of court.
If company gamma appeals the decision, then either company gamma loses the patent case or company beta does not lose the patent case.
Whenever lab 2 produces vaccine, lab 1 does not use chemical catalyst.
Provided that lab 2 produces antibiotic, lab 1 does not use chemical catalyst.
Either lab 1 produces painkiller, or lab 2 produces vaccine, or lab 2 produces antibiotic.
If the research project requires funding, then lab 1 does not produce painkiller.
If it is not the case that company gamma developing medication implies company beta does not develop medication, then company beta violates a patent.
Whenever it is not the case that company gamma developing medication implies company beta does not develop medication, company beta loses the patent case.
Provided that it is not the case that the absence of investment in venture capital implies the herbal tincture contains alcohol, the herbal tincture does not pass the safety test.
If it is not the case that the absence of investment in venture capital implies the disinfectant does not contain alcohol, then the disinfectant passes the clinical trial.
Under the condition that company gamma does not face a lawsuit, company gamma does not settle out of court.
Whenever the research project does not require funding, the research project receives a grant.
If venture capital does not have investment, then the disinfectant contains alcohol.
If venture capital does not have investment, then the herbal tincture does not contain alcohol.

The research project does not receive a grant.

(A1 ∨ G).natural: Either lab 1 uses synthetic base or venture capital has investment.

(A11 → A20).natural: Provided that company alpha develops medication, medication X is recalled from the market.

(A11 → A21).natural: Whenever company alpha develops medication, medication X is approved for sale.

(A11 → ¬A20).natural: If company alpha develops medication, then medication X is not recalled from the market.

(A11 ∨ (¬(¬G → A9) → A10)).natural: Either company alpha develops medication, or if it is not the case that the absence of investment in venture capital implies the herbal tincture contains alcohol, then the herbal tincture passes the safety test.

(A12 ∨ ¬A11).natural: Either company beta develops medication or company alpha does not develop medication.

(A13 → A15).natural: Under the condition that company gamma develops medication, company gamma acquires a license.

(A13 → ¬A12).natural: Provided that company gamma develops medication, company beta does not develop medication.

(A13 ∨ A14).natural: Either company gamma develops medication or company delta develops medication.

(A14 → ¬A12).natural: If company delta develops medication, then company beta does not develop medication.

(A15 → ¬A12).natural: Whenever company gamma acquires a license, company beta does not develop medication.

(A18 → A17).natural: Under the condition that the disinfectant passes the clinical trial, the disinfectant is approved by the FDA.

(A19 → (A18 → A17)).natural: If company epsilon develops medication, then whenever the disinfectant passes the clinical trial, the disinfectant is approved by the FDA.

(A2 → (A1 ∨ G)).natural: Provided that lab 1 uses organic extract, either lab 1 uses synthetic base or venture capital has investment.

(A21 → ¬A20).natural: If medication X is approved for sale, then it is not recalled from the market.

(A22 ∨ (A11 → A21)).natural: Either company zeta develops medication, or if company alpha develops medication, medication X is approved for sale.

(A23 → A24).natural: Under the condition that company eta develops medication, company eta acquires a license.

(A23 → ¬A24).natural: Provided that company eta develops medication, company eta does not acquire a license.

(A23 ∨ (A22 ∨ (A11 → A21))).natural: Either company eta develops medication, or company zeta develops medication, or if company alpha develops medication, medication X is approved for sale.

(A26 ∨ ¬A25).natural: Either company gamma violates a patent or company beta does not violate a patent.

(A27 → (A26 ∨ ¬A25)).natural: Whenever company beta faces a lawsuit, either company gamma violates a patent or company beta does not violate a patent.

(A28 → A27).natural: If company gamma faces a lawsuit, then company beta faces a lawsuit.

(A3 ∨ A2).natural: Either lab 1 uses chemical catalyst or lab 1 uses organic extract.

(A30 → (¬A28 → A29)).natural: Provided that company beta hires a law firm, if company gamma does not face a lawsuit, then company gamma settles out of court.

(A30 ∨ A31).natural: Either company beta hires a law firm or company gamma hires a law firm.

(A31 → (¬A28 → A29)).natural: Under the condition that company gamma hires a law firm, if company gamma does not face a lawsuit, then company gamma settles out of court.

(A32 ∨ (A30 → (¬A28 → A29))).natural: Either company beta negotiates a settlement or if company beta hires a law firm, then provided company gamma does not face a lawsuit, company gamma settles out of court.

(A34 ∨ ¬A33).natural: Either company gamma loses the patent case or company beta does not lose the patent case.

(A35 → (A34 ∨ ¬A33)).natural: If company gamma appeals the decision, then either company gamma loses the patent case or company beta does not lose the patent case.

(A4 → ¬A3).natural: Whenever lab 2 produces vaccine, lab 1 does not use chemical catalyst.

(A4 ∨ A5).natural: Either lab 2 produces vaccine or lab 2 produces antibiotic.

(A5 → ¬A3).natural: Provided that lab 2 produces antibiotic, lab 1 does not use chemical catalyst.

(A6 ∨ (A4 ∨ A5)).natural: Either lab 1 produces painkiller, or lab 2 produces vaccine, or lab 2 produces antibiotic.

(A7 → ¬A6).natural: If the research project requires funding, then lab 1 does not produce painkiller.

(¬(A13 → ¬A12) → A25).natural: If it is not the case that company gamma developing medication implies company beta does not develop medication, then company beta violates a patent.

(¬(A13 → ¬A12) → A33).natural: Whenever it is not the case that company gamma developing medication implies company beta does not develop medication, company beta loses the patent case.

(¬(¬G → A9) → A10).natural: If it is not the case that the absence of investment in venture capital implies the herbal tincture contains alcohol, then the herbal tincture passes the safety test.

(¬(¬G → A9) → ¬A10).natural: Provided that it is not the case that the absence of investment in venture capital implies the herbal tincture contains alcohol, the herbal tincture does not pass the safety test.

(¬(¬G → ¬A16) → A18).natural: If it is not the case that the absence of investment in venture capital implies the disinfectant does not contain alcohol, then the disinfectant passes the clinical trial.

(¬A28 → A29).natural: Provided that company gamma does not face a lawsuit, company gamma settles out of court.

(¬A28 → ¬A29).natural: Under the condition that company gamma does not face a lawsuit, company gamma does not settle out of court.

(¬A7 → A8).natural: Whenever the research project does not require funding, the research project receives a grant.

(¬G → A16).natural: If venture capital does not have investment, then the disinfectant contains alcohol.
